# breaks.suggest_break { #deepworks.breaks.suggest_break }

```python
breaks.suggest_break(
    minutes_worked,
    energy_level,
    break_type='any',
    duration=5,
    indoor_only=False,
    seed=None,
)
```

Suggest a break activity based on current state and preferences.

## Parameters {.doc-section .doc-section-parameters}

| Name           | Type   | Description                                                                                       | Default    |
|----------------|--------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------|
| minutes_worked | int    | How long you've been working (in minutes). This will influence the length of the suggested break. | _required_ |
| energy_level   | int    | Your current energy level on a scale of 1-10.                                                     | _required_ |
| break_type     | str    | Preferred break type: 'active', 'rest', 'social', 'mindful', or 'any'. Default is 'any'.          | `'any'`    |
| duration       | int    | Desired break duration: 5, 10, 15, or 20 minutes. Default is 5.                                   | `5`        |
| indoor_only    | bool   | If True, only suggest indoor activities. Default is False.                                        | `False`    |
| seed           | int    | Random seed for reproducible selection.                                                           | `None`     |

## Returns {.doc-section .doc-section-returns}

| Name   | Type   | Description                                                                                              |
|--------|--------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
|        | dict   | Activity dictionary with keys: name, description, duration_minutes, category, energy_required, location. |

## Raises {.doc-section .doc-section-raises}

| Name   | Type       | Description                                                           |
|--------|------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------|
|        | TypeError  | If minutes_worked, energy_level, or duration are not integers.        |
|        | ValueError | If energy_level not in 1-10, break_type invalid, or duration invalid. |

## Examples {.doc-section .doc-section-examples}

```python
>>> activity = suggest_break(
...     minutes_worked=90, energy_level=4, break_type="active", seed=42
... )
>>> print(activity['name'])
Jumping Jacks
>>> print(activity['duration_minutes'])
5
>>> print(activity['category'])
active
```

```python
>>> activity = suggest_break(
...     minutes_worked=30, energy_level=2, break_type="mindful", duration=10, seed=123
... )
>>> print(activity)
{'name': 'Deep Breathing', 'description': 'Practice 4-7-8 breathing or box breathing.', 'duration_minutes': 5, 'category': 'mindful', 'energy_required': 'low', 'location': 'indoor'}
```
